name: SHuttle - A Pushbullet CLI for the Bash Shell
tagline: Send notes, files, links, and more from your command line to other devices
body:
### SHuttle - A Pushbullet CLI for the Bash Shell This page is a work in progress. For more information in the meantime, see [Shuttle on GitHub](https://github.com/andyforceno/shuttle). ### Installation git clone https://github.com/andyforceno/shuttle/
cd to shuttle/
chmod +x shuttle
./shuttle
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
